location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'APPENDIX A. RAS EL HADD SKETCH SITE PLAN'

mods.abstract: Sketch plan of Ras El Hadd (Ras Al Hadd) landing ground at Salalah, Oman. The plan highlights the following suggested buildings:1. Windsock2. Power house3. Distillation plant4. Europeans staff quarter5. Kitchen and store6-10. Store sheds11. Taxi trackThe plan also highlights areas such as fish drying area, and Ras Al Hadd village. The plan is prepared by G S Cooper, Civil Engineer, Air Headquarters, Iraq as part of a report titled ‘REPORT ON SOUTH ARABIAN COAST- INSPECTION TOUR- SEPTEMBER, 1942.’ The plan itself is marked as Appendix A.The scale is approximately 3 inches to 1 mile
